Berserk:




Berserk lept from Apocolpyse's shots, but the last hit his arm on 
landing. He snarled from it and shot his optics at him in a harsh 
glance. His thrusted his sword into the air, turning it onto its whip 
mode. He readied himself to strike the bot before him.

But he paused when he heard him say Megatron. The name was so 
familiar. He mused back on Cybertron when some of his victims 
shouted, It's Megatron! or That thing looks just like Megatron.

"Who is Megatron?" he said. "Take me to him."
